message: I'll take the lion's share, but let's start with a fair compromise.  Think of it as an investment in our future negotiations!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to settle this now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.

I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile. Let's split the difference from your last offer.  This is a fair and equitable solution that ensures we both get a decent amount.
Alice, time is literally money at this point! I'm offering a compromise - closer to your last offer, but still recognizing my initial stake in this.  Let's end this before we both lose out more.
